author: ajith
msg: Applying Thilini's patch for client side REST support. The build has been verified to be intact.
1. CommonsHTTPTransportSender.java has been modified to process POST's correctly for the REST requests
2. A new constant has been added to represent some REST content types
3. Test cases added. But these are excluded from the build since they run against an external site

author: elecharny
msg: Added a test case with vsldap data
